text: z Height strategy: Appropriate height of 110m at the tallest point, which should be at the eastern end of the site. Heights should step down towards the existing lower-rise context in the west. z Development should enable clear lines of sight between Millharbour and Millwall Outer Dock and ensure multiple visual and pedestrian permeability between Tiller Road and Millwall Outer Dock. z Protect or enhance the setting of the Maritime Greenwich world heritage site. BACK TO CONTENTS Routes and streets z Improve walking and cycling connections to, from and within the site
